Hoboken.Murray's Cheese: Murray’s Cheese is an artisanal cheese and specialty foods retailer and wholesaler based in Greenwich Village in New York City. Founded in Greenwich Village in 1940 as an egg and dairy wholesaler, the company later expanded, and in 2012 opened a restaurant in Manhattan named Murray’s Cheese Bar. As of 2017 there are more than 350 locations, and in February 2017 the franchise was acquired by the Kroger Company.
